articles.title: 50 Expresii Romantice GreceÈ™ti pentru Orice Ocazie: ExprimÄƒ-È›i Dragostea ca un Nativ
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';

Vrei sÄƒ-i furzi inimÄƒ partenerului tÄƒu cu cuvinte greceÈ™ti pline de dragoste? Grecia nu este doar È›ara zeilor È™i a plajelor superbe, ci È™i limba romantismului mediteranean. ÃmpreunÄƒ cu partenerul tÄƒu, puteÈ›i descoperi cum sÄƒ vÄƒ exprimaÈ›i iubirea Ã®n cea mai poeticÄƒ limbÄƒ europeanÄƒ. De la complimente dulci pÃ¢nÄƒ la declaraÈ›ii pasionale, aceste expresii vÄƒ vor apropia È™i mai mult.

<PhraseOfDay
  word="Î£' Î±Î³Î±Ï€Ï"
  translation="Te iubesc"
  pronunciation="sah-gah-POH"
  context="Cel mai important cuvÃ¢nt - foloseÈ™te-l Ã®n fiecare zi cu partenerul tÄƒu."
/>

## Bazele romantismului: Expresii esenÈ›iale (1-10)

Aceste zece expresii sunt fundamentul oricÄƒrei conversaÈ›ii romantice Ã®n greacÄƒ. ÃnvaÈ›Äƒ-le Ã®mpreunÄƒ È™i folosiÈ›i-le zilnic!

<VocabCard
  word="Î‘Î³Î¬Ï€Î· Î¼Î¿Ï…"
  translation="Iubirea mea"
  pronunciation="ah-GAH-pee moh-OO"
  example="Î‘Î³Î¬Ï€Î· Î¼Î¿Ï…, Ï€ÏÏ‚ ÎµÎ¯ÏƒÎ±Î¹ ÏƒÎ®Î¼ÎµÏÎ±;"
/>

| GreacÄƒ | RomÃ¢nÄƒ | PronunÈ›ie | CÃ¢nd sÄƒ foloseÈ™ti |
|--------|--------|-----------|-------------------|
| **Î£' Î±Î³Î±Ï€Ï** | Te iubesc | sah-gah-POH | DeclaraÈ›ia supremÄƒ |
| **ÎœÎ¿Ï… Î»ÎµÎ¯Ï€ÎµÎ¹Ï‚** | Ãmi lipseÈ™ti | moo LEE-pees | CÃ¢nd sunteÈ›i departe |
| **Î•Î¯ÏƒÎ±Î¹ ÏŒÎ¼Î¿ÏÏ†Î¿Ï‚/Î·** | EÈ™ti frumos/frumoasÄƒ | EE-seh oh-MOR-fohs/ee | Complement zilnic |
| **Î£Îµ ÏƒÎºÎ­Ï†Ï„Î¿Î¼Î±Î¹** | MÄƒ gÃ¢ndesc la tine | seh SKEF-toh-meh | Mesaje romantice |
| **ÎšÎ±ÏÎ´Î¹Î¬ Î¼Î¿Ï…** | Inima mea | kar-DYAH moh-OO | Termen de alint |
| **Î–Ï‰Î® Î¼Î¿Ï…** | ViaÈ›a mea | ZOH-ee moh-OO | Expresie tandrÄƒ |
| **Î¦Ï‰Ï‚ Î¼Î¿Ï…** | Lumina mea | foss moh-OO | Momente romantice |
| **ÎŒÎ½ÎµÎ¹ÏÏŒ Î¼Î¿Ï…** | Visul meu | OH-nee-roh moh-OO | DeclaraÈ›ii romantice |
| **ÎœÎ±Ï„Î¬ÎºÎ¹Î± Î¼Î¿Ï…** | OchiiÈ™orii mei | mah-TAH-kyah moh-OO | Alint drÄƒgÄƒstos |
| **Î¨Ï…Ï‡Î® Î¼Î¿Ï…** | Sufletul meu | psee-HEE moh-OO | Dragoste profundÄƒ |

## Complimente care topesc inimÄƒ (11-20)

Grecii sunt maeÈ™tri Ã®n arta complimentelor. FoloseÈ™te aceste expresii pentru a-È›i face partenerul sÄƒ se simtÄƒ special Ã®n fiecare zi.

<CultureTip flag="ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡·" title="Cultura complimentelor">
Grecii apreciazÄƒ complimentele sincere È™i le oferÄƒ generos. Nu te teme sÄƒ exagerezi puÈ›in - este parte din cultura lor caldÄƒ È™i expresivÄƒ!
</CultureTip>

<VocabCard
  word="ÎˆÏ‡ÎµÎ¹Ï‚ ÏŒÎ¼Î¿ÏÏ†Î± Î¼Î¬Ï„Î¹Î±"
  translation="Ai ochi frumoÈ™i"
  pronunciation="EH-hees oh-MOR-fah MAH-tyah"
  example="ÎˆÏ‡ÎµÎ¹Ï‚ ÏŒÎ¼Î¿ÏÏ†Î± Î¼Î¬Ï„Î¹Î±, Î±Î³Î¬Ï€Î· Î¼Î¿Ï…."
/>

| GreacÄƒ | RomÃ¢nÄƒ | PronunÈ›ie |
|--------|--------|-----------|
| **ÎœÎ¿Ï… Î±ÏÎ­ÏƒÎµÎ¹ Ï„Î¿ Ï‡Î±Î¼ÏŒÎ³ÎµÎ»ÏŒ ÏƒÎ¿Ï…** | Ãmi place zÃ¢mbetul tÄƒu | moo ah-REH-see toh hah-MOH-yeh-loh soo |
| **Î•Î¯ÏƒÎ±Î¹ Ï„Î­Î»ÎµÎ¹Î¿Ï‚/Î±** | EÈ™ti perfect/perfectÄƒ | EE-seh TEH-lee-ohs/ah |
| **ÎˆÏ‡ÎµÎ¹Ï‚ Ï…Ï€Î­ÏÎ¿Ï‡Î¿ Î³Î­Î»Î¹Î¿** | Ai un rÃ¢s minunat | EH-hees EE-peh-roh-hoh YEH-lee-oh |
| **ÎœÏ…ÏÎ¯Î¶ÎµÎ¹Ï‚ ÏŒÎ¼Î¿ÏÏ†Î±** | MiroÈ™i frumos | mee-REE-zehs oh-MOR-fah |
| **ÎÏ„ÏÎ½ÎµÏƒÎ±Î¹ Ï„Î­Î»ÎµÎ¹Î±** | Te Ã®mbraci perfect | DEE-neh-seh TEH-lee-ah |
| **ÎˆÏ‡ÎµÎ¹Ï‚ Ï‰ÏÎ±Î¯Î¿ ÏƒÏ„Ï…Î»** | Ai un stil frumos | EH-hehs oh-REH-oh steehl |
| **Î•Î¯ÏƒÎ±Î¹ ÏŒÎ¼Î¿ÏÏ†Î¿Ï‚ Î¼Î­ÏƒÎ±-Î­Î¾Ï‰** | EÈ™ti frumos/frumoasÄƒ interior È™i exterior | EE-seh oh-MOR-fohs MEH-sah EH-ksoh |
| **ÎœÎµ ÎºÎ¬Î½ÎµÎ¹Ï‚ Ï‡Î±ÏÎ¿ÏÎ¼ÎµÎ½Î¿/Î·** | MÄƒ faci fericit/fericitÄƒ | meh KAH-nees hah-ROO-meh-noh/ee |

## DeclaraÈ›ii pasionale (21-30)

Pentru momentele cÃ¢nd dragostea ta este atÃ¢t de intensÄƒ Ã®ncÃ¢t cuvintele simple nu sunt suficiente.

<CultureTip flag="ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡·" title="Pasiunea greceascÄƒ">
Grecii nu se tem sÄƒ-È™i exprime emoÈ›iile. Pasiunea lor este autenticÄƒ È™i vibrantÄƒ - nu te reÈ›ine sÄƒ fii expresiv!
</CultureTip>

| GreacÄƒ | RomÃ¢nÄƒ | PronunÈ›ie |
|--------|--------|-----------|
| **Î”ÎµÎ½ Î¼Ï€Î¿ÏÏ Î½Î± Î¶Î®ÏƒÏ‰ Ï‡Ï‰ÏÎ¯Ï‚ ÎµÏƒÎ­Î½Î±** | Nu pot trÄƒi fÄƒrÄƒ tine | dehn boh-ROH nah ZEE-soh HOH-rees eh-SEH-nah |
| **Î•Î¯ÏƒÎ±Î¹ Î¿ ÎºÏŒÏƒÎ¼Î¿Ï‚ Î¼Î¿Ï…** | EÈ™ti lumea mea | EE-seh oh KOHS-mohs moh-OO |
| **Î— ÎºÎ±ÏÎ´Î¹Î¬ Î¼Î¿Ï… Ï‡Ï„Ï…Ï€Î¬ÎµÎ¹ Î³Î¹Î± ÏƒÎ­Î½Î±** | Inima mea bate pentru tine | ee kar-DYAH moh-OO htee-PAH-ee yah seh-NAH |
| **ÎœÎµ Î¿Î»Î¿ÎºÎ»Î·ÏÏÎ½ÎµÎ¹Ï‚** | MÄƒ completezi | meh oh-loh-klee-ROH-nees |
| **Î•Î¯Î¼Î±ÏƒÏ„Îµ Ï†Ï„Î¹Î±Î³Î¼Î­Î½Î¿Î¹ Î¿ Î­Î½Î±Ï‚ Î³Î¹Î± Ï„Î¿Î½ Î¬Î»Î»Î¿Î½** | Suntem fÄƒcuÈ›i unul pentru celÄƒlalt | EE-mahs-teh ftee-ah-MEH-nee oh EH-nahs yah tohn AH-lohn |
| **Î£Îµ Î¸Î­Î»Ï‰ Î³Î¹Î± Ï€Î¬Î½Ï„Î±** | Te vreau pentru totdeauna | seh THEH-loh yah PAHN-dah |
| **Î•Î¯ÏƒÎ±Î¹ Î· Î¼ÏŒÎ½Î· Î¼Î¿Ï…** | EÈ™ti singura mea | EE-seh ee MOH-nee moh-OO |
| **Î— Î±Î³Î¬Ï€Î· Î¼Î¿Ï… Î³Î¹Î± ÏƒÎ­Î½Î± ÎµÎ¯Î½Î±Î¹ Î±Î¹ÏÎ½Î¹Î±** | Dragostea mea pentru tine este veÈ™nicÄƒ | ee ah-GAH-pee moh-OO yah seh-NAH EE-neh eh-EE-oh-nee-ah |
| **ÎœÎµ ÎºÎ¬Î½ÎµÎ¹Ï‚ ÎºÎ±Î»ÏÏ„ÎµÏÎ¿ Î¬Î½Î¸ÏÏ‰Ï€Î¿** | MÄƒ faci un om mai bun | meh KAH-nees kah-LEE-teh-roh AHN-throh-poh |
| **Î— Î¶Ï‰Î® Î¼Î¿Ï… Î¬ÏÏ‡Î¹ÏƒÎµ ÏŒÏ„Î±Î½ ÏƒÎµ Î³Î½ÏÏÎ¹ÏƒÎ±** | ViaÈ›a mea a Ã®nceput cÃ¢nd te-am cunoscut | ee ZOH-ee moh-OO AR-hee-seh OH-tahn seh GNOH-ree-sah |

## Expresii pentru momente speciale (31-40)

Fie cÄƒ sÄƒrbÄƒtoriÈ›i aniversarea, o realizare importantÄƒ sau pur È™i simplu pentru cÄƒ vÄƒ iubiÈ›i, aceste expresii adaugÄƒ magie momentelor voastre.

DacÄƒ vrei sÄƒ explorezi È™i mai multe moduri de a-È›i exprima dragostea, descoperÄƒ [ghidul nostru complet despre cum sÄƒ spui â€te iubescâ€ Ã®n greacÄƒ](/learn/ro/el/how-to-say-i-love-you-in-greek/).

<VocabCard
  word="Î§ÏÏŒÎ½Î¹Î± Ï€Î¿Î»Î»Î¬, Î±Î³Î¬Ï€Î· Î¼Î¿Ï…"
  translation="La mulÈ›i ani, iubirea mea"
  pronunciation="HROH-nee-ah POH-lah ah-GAH-pee moh-OO"
  example="Î§ÏÏŒÎ½Î¹Î± Ï€Î¿Î»Î»Î¬, Î±Î³Î¬Ï€Î· Î¼Î¿Ï…! Î£' Î±Î³Î±Ï€Ï!"
/>

| GreacÄƒ | RomÃ¢nÄƒ | PronunÈ›ie |
|--------|--------|-----------|
| **Î£Ï…Î³Ï‡Î±ÏÎ·Ï„Î®ÏÎ¹Î±, ÎºÎ±Î¼Î¬ÏÎ¹ Î¼Î¿Ï…** | FelicitÄƒri, mÃ¢ndria mea | see-hah-ree-TEE-ree-ah kah-MAH-ree moh-OO |
| **Î¥Ï€ÎµÏÎ®Ï†Î±Î½Î¿Ï‚ Î³Î¹Î± ÏƒÎ­Î½Î±** | MÃ¢ndru de tine | ee-peh-REE-fah-nohs yah seh-NAH |
| **ÎÎ± ÎµÎ¯ÏƒÎ±Î¹ Ï€Î¬Î½Ï„Î± ÎµÏ…Ï„Ï…Ï‡Î¹ÏƒÎ¼Î­Î½Î¿Ï‚/Î·** | SÄƒ fii Ã®ntotdeauna fericit/fericitÄƒ | nah EE-seh PAHN-dah ef-tee-hee-SMEH-nohs/ee |
| **Î¤Î¿ ÏŒÎ½ÎµÎ¹ÏÏŒ Î¼Î¿Ï… Î­Î³Î¹Î½Îµ Ï€ÏÎ±Î³Î¼Î±Ï„Î¹ÎºÏŒÏ„Î·Ï„Î±** | Visul meu a devenit realitate | toh OH-nee-roh moh-OO EH-yee-neh prah-mah-tee-KOH-tee-tah |
| **ÎœÎ±Î¶Î¯ Î³Î¹Î± Ï€Î¬Î½Ï„Î±** | ÃmpreunÄƒ pentru totdeauna | mah-ZEE yah PAHN-dah |
| **ÎšÎ¬Î¸Îµ Î¼Î­ÏÎ± Î¼Î±Î¶Î¯ ÏƒÎ¿Ï… ÎµÎ¯Î½Î±Î¹ Î´ÏÏÎ¿** | Fiecare zi alÄƒturi de tine este un cadou | KAH-thee MEH-rah mah-ZEE soo EE-neh THOH-roh |
| **Î•Ï…Ï‡Î±ÏÎ¹ÏƒÏ„Ï Ï€Î¿Ï… ÎµÎ¯ÏƒÎ±Î¹ ÏƒÏ„Î· Î¶Ï‰Î® Î¼Î¿Ï…** | MulÈ›umesc cÄƒ eÈ™ti Ã®n viaÈ›a mea | ef-hah-ree-STOH poh EE-seh stee ZOH-ee moh-OO |
| **Î£' ÎµÏ…Ï‡Î±ÏÎ¹ÏƒÏ„Ï Î³Î¹Î± Ï„Î·Î½ Î±Î³Î¬Ï€Î· ÏƒÎ¿Ï…** | ÃÈ›i mulÈ›umesc pentru dragostea ta | seh ef-hah-ree-STOH yah tee-nee ah-GAH-pee soo |

## Expresii drÄƒgÄƒstoase de zi cu zi (41-50)

Nu ai nevoie de ocazii speciale pentru a-È›i exprima dragostea. Aceste expresii simple pot fi folosite Ã®n fiecare zi pentru a vÄƒ menÈ›ine flacÄƒra iubirii vie.

Pentru a Ã®nvÄƒÈ›a È™i alte moduri de a vÄƒ rÄƒsfÄƒÈ›a reciproc, consultaÈ›i [lista noastrÄƒ cu nume de alint greceÈ™ti](/learn/ro/el/greek-pet-names-for-your-partner/).

<CultureTip flag="ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡·" title="AfecÈ›iunea zilnicÄƒ">
Grecii nu Ã®È™i rezervÄƒ expresiile romantice doar pentru ocazii speciale. AfecÈ›iunea este exprimatÄƒ zilnic, Ã®n moduri mici dar semnificative!
</CultureTip>

| GreacÄƒ | RomÃ¢nÄƒ | PronunÈ›ie |
|--------|--------|-----------|
| **ÎšÎ±Î»Î·Î¼Î­ÏÎ±, ÏŒÎ¼Î¿ÏÏ†Î· Î¼Î¿Ï…** | BunÄƒ dimineaÈ›a, frumoasÄƒ mea | kah-lee-MEH-rah OH-mor-fee moh-OO |
| **ÎšÎ±Î»ÏŒ Î²ÏÎ¬Î´Ï…, Î³Î»Ï…ÎºÎ¹Î¬ Î¼Î¿Ï…** | Noapte bunÄƒ, dulcea mea | kah-LOH VRAH-thee ghlee-KEE-ah moh-OO |
| **ÎŒÎ½ÎµÎ¹ÏÎ± Î³Î»Ï…ÎºÎ¬** | Vise plÄƒcute | OH-nee-rah ghlee-KAH |
| **Î£Îµ Ï†Î¹Î»Î¬Ï‰** | Te sÄƒrut | seh fee-LAH-oh |
| **ÎœÎ¿Ï… Î»ÎµÎ¯Ï€ÎµÎ¹ Î· Î±Î³ÎºÎ±Î»Î¹Î¬ ÏƒÎ¿Ï…** | Ãmi lipseÈ™te Ã®mbrÄƒÈ›iÈ™area ta | moo LEE-peee ee ah-gah-LYAH soo |
| **Î˜Î­Î»Ï‰ Î½Î± ÏƒÎµ Î´Ï‰** | Vreau sÄƒ te vÄƒd | THEH-loh nah seh doh |
| **ÎˆÎ»Î± ÎµÎ´Ï, Î±Î³ÎºÎ±Î»Î¹Î¬ Î¼Î¿Ï…** | Vino aici, Ã®mbrÄƒÈ›iÈ™area mea | EH-lah eh-DOH ah-gah-LYAH moh-OO |
| **ÎœÎ­Î½ÎµÎ¹Ï‚ Ï€Î¬Î½Ï„Î± ÏƒÏ„Î·Î½ ÎºÎ±ÏÎ´Î¹Î¬ Î¼Î¿Ï…** | RÄƒmÃ¢i mereu Ã®n inimÄƒ mea | MEH-nees PAHN-dah stee-neen kar-DYAH moh-OO |
| **ÎÎ± Ï€ÏÎ¿ÏƒÎ­Ï‡ÎµÎ¹Ï‚, Î±Î³Î¬Ï€Î· Î¼Î¿Ï…** | Ai grijÄƒ, iubirea mea | nah proh-SEH-hees ah-GAH-pee moh-OO |
| **Î£Îµ ÏƒÎºÎ­Ï†Ï„Î¿Î¼Î±Î¹ ÏƒÏ…Î½Î­Ï‡ÎµÎ¹Î±** | MÄƒ gÃ¢ndesc la tine continuu | seh SKEF-toh-meh see-NEH-hee-ah |

## Cum sÄƒ foloseÈ™ti aceste expresii cu partenerul tÄƒu

Acum cÄƒ ai Ã®nvÄƒÈ›at aceste expresii romantice, iatÄƒ cÃ¢teva sfaturi pentru a le integra natural Ã®n relaÈ›ia voastrÄƒ:

1. **Ãncepe Ã®ncet** - Alege 2-3 expresii favorite È™i foloseÈ™te-le regulat
2. **Practice together** - PracticaÈ›i Ã®mpreunÄƒ pronunÈ›ia È™i folosirea lor
3. **Fii autentic** - FoloseÈ™te expresiile care Ã®È›i reflectÄƒ cel mai bine sentimentele
4. **CreeazÄƒ ritualuri** - Spune â€ÎšÎ±Î»Î·Î¼Î­ÏÎ±" È™i â€ÎšÎ±Î»ÏŒ Î²ÏÎ¬Î´Ï…" Ã®n fiecare zi
5. **Scrie mesaje** - Trimite-i partenerului mesaje cu expresii greceÈ™ti

Pentru mai multe cuvinte esenÈ›iale pentru cupluri, nu rata [lista noastrÄƒ cu 100 de cuvinte comune greceÈ™ti](/learn/ro/el/100-common-greek-words/).

Cele mai frecvente greÈ™eli de evitat:
- Nu traduce literal - expresiile idiomatice nu au Ã®ntotdeauna sens direct
- Nu forÈ›a pronunÈ›ia perfectÄƒ - autenticitatea conteazÄƒ mai mult
- Nu folosi expresii prea formale cu partenerul - pÄƒstreazÄƒ-le pe cele calde È™i personale

## Concluzie: Iubirea vorbeÈ™te greacÄƒ

ÃnvÄƒÈ›area acestor expresii romantice greceÈ™ti nu este doar despre cuvinte - este despre a crea conexiuni mai profunde cu partenerul tÄƒu. Fiecare frazÄƒ Ã®nvÄƒÈ›atÄƒ Ã®mpreunÄƒ vÄƒ apropie mai mult È™i vÄƒ ajutÄƒ sÄƒ construiÈ›i amintiri frumoase. Grecia este renumitÄƒ pentru pasiunea È™i romantismul sÄƒu, iar acum puteÈ›i aduce aceastÄƒ magie Ã®n relaÈ›ia voastrÄƒ.

Nu uitaÈ›i - cel mai important lucru nu este pronunÈ›ia perfectÄƒ, ci dragostea È™i efortul pe care le puneÈ›i Ã®n Ã®nvÄƒÈ›are. Partenerul vostru va aprecia cu siguranÈ›Äƒ timpul È™i energia investitÄƒ pentru a Ã®nvÄƒÈ›a sÄƒ vÄƒ exprimaÈ›i dragostea Ã®ntr-o limbÄƒ nouÄƒ.

articles.title: Griechische Aussprache: Ein Leitfaden fÃ¼r Deutsche
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';
import CultureTip from '@components/CultureTip.astro';
import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';

# Griechische Aussprache: Ein Leitfaden fÃ¼r Deutsche

Das griechische Alphabet mag auf den ersten Blick einschÃ¼chternd wirken, aber viele Buchstaben sind dir bereits bekannt! Hier lernst du, wie du Griechisch richtig aussprichst.

## Die wichtigste Regel

<PhraseOfDay
  word="Griechisch lesen = Griechisch sprechen"
  translation="Die Schreibweise entspricht weitgehend der Aussprache"
  context="Im Gegensatz zum Englischen wird Griechisch fast immer so ausgesprochen, wie es geschrieben wird."
/>

## Das griechische Alphabet

Das griechische Alphabet hat 24 Buchstaben:

| Buchstabe | Name | Aussprache | Wie im Deutschen |
|-----------|------|------------|------------------|
| **Î‘ Î±** | Alpha | a | wie "a" in "Vater" |
| **Î’ Î²** | Beta | v | wie "w" in "Wasser" |
| **Î“ Î³** | Gamma | g/j | wie "g" oder weiches "j" |
| **Î” Î´** | Delta | th (stimmhaft) | wie engl. "th" in "this" |
| **Î• Îµ** | Epsilon | e | wie "e" in "Bett" |
| **Î– Î¶** | Zeta | s | wie "s" in "Rose" |
| **Î— Î·** | Eta | i | wie "i" in "Kino" |
| **Î˜ Î¸** | Theta | th (stimmlos) | wie engl. "th" in "think" |
| **Î™ Î¹** | Iota | i | wie "i" in "Kino" |
| **Îš Îº** | Kappa | k | wie "k" in "Kind" |
| **Î› Î»** | Lambda | l | wie "l" in "Lampe" |
| **Îœ Î¼** | My | m | wie "m" in "Mutter" |
| **Î Î½** | Ny | n | wie "n" in "Nase" |
| **Î Î¾** | Xi | ks | wie "x" in "Taxi" |
| **ÎŸ Î¿** | Omikron | o | wie "o" in "offen" |
| **Î  Ï€** | Pi | p | wie "p" in "Park" |
| **Î¡ Ï** | Rho | r | gerolltes "r" |
| **Î£ Ïƒ/Ï‚** | Sigma | s | wie "ss" in "Wasser" |
| **Î¤ Ï„** | Tau | t | wie "t" in "Tisch" |
| **Î¥ Ï…** | Ypsilon | i | wie "i" in "Kino" |
| **Î¦ Ï†** | Phi | f | wie "f" in "Fisch" |
| **Î§ Ï‡** | Chi | ch | wie "ch" in "Bach" |
| **Î¨ Ïˆ** | Psi | ps | wie "ps" in "Psyche" |
| **Î© Ï‰** | Omega | o | wie "o" in "offen" |

<CultureTip title="Drei Buchstaben fÃ¼r 'i'" flag="ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡·">
Im Griechischen gibt es drei Buchstaben, die alle "i" ausgesprochen werden: Î— (Eta), Î™ (Iota) und Î¥ (Ypsilon). Das ist historisch bedingt - frÃ¼her hatten sie unterschiedliche Laute!
</CultureTip>

## Wichtige Buchstabenkombinationen

### Doppelbuchstaben (Diphthonge)

| Kombination | Aussprache | Beispiel | Bedeutung |
|-------------|------------|----------|-----------|
| **Î±Î¹** | e | ÎºÎ±Î»Î±Î¯ | gut (fem. pl.) |
| **ÎµÎ¹** | i | ÎµÎ¯Î¼Î±Î¹ | ich bin |
| **Î¿Î¹** | i | Ï€Î¿Î¹Î¿Ï‚ | wer |
| **Ï…Î¹** | i | Ï…Î¹ÏŒÏ‚ | Sohn |
| **Î±Ï…** | av/af | Î±Ï…Ï„ÏŒÏ‚ | dieser |
| **ÎµÏ…** | ev/ef | ÎµÏ…Ï‡Î±ÏÎ¹ÏƒÏ„Ï | danke |
| **Î¿Ï…** | u | Ï€Î¿Ï… | wo |

<VocabCard
  word="Î±Ï… und ÎµÏ… Regel"
  translation="'av/ev' vor Vokalen und Î²,Î³,Î´,Î¶,Î»,Î¼,Î½,Ï - 'af/ef' vor anderen Konsonanten"
  example="Î±Ï…Ï„ÏŒÏ‚ (av-TOS) aber Î±ÏÏÎ¹Î¿ (AV-ri-o) vs. ÎµÏ…Ï„Ï…Ï‡Î¹ÏƒÎ¼Î­Î½Î¿Ï‚ (ef-ti-chis-ME-nos)"
/>

### Doppelkonsonanten

| Kombination | Aussprache | Beispiel |
|-------------|------------|----------|
| **Î¼Ï€** | b (am Anfang) / mb (in der Mitte) | Î¼Ï€Î¿ÏÏ (bo-RO) |
| **Î½Ï„** | d (am Anfang) / nd (in der Mitte) | Î½Ï„Î¿Î¼Î¬Ï„Î± (do-MA-ta) |
| **Î³Îº** | g (am Anfang) / ng (in der Mitte) | Î³ÎºÎ±ÏÎ¬Î¶ (ga-RAS) |
| **Î³Î³** | ng | Î±Î³Î³Î»Î¹ÎºÎ¬ (an-gli-KA) |
| **Ï„Ïƒ** | ts | Ï„ÏƒÎ¬Î¹ (TSA-i) |
| **Ï„Î¶** | dz | Ï„Î¶Î¬ÎºÎ¹ (DZA-ki) |

## Besondere Laute fÃ¼r Deutsche

### Das stimmhafte "th" (Î´)

<VocabCard
  word="Î” - Delta"
  translation="Stimmhaftes 'th' wie im Englischen 'this'"
  pronunciation="th (stimmhaft)"
  example="Î´Î­ÎºÎ± (THE-ka) = zehn, Î´ÏÏÎ¿ (THO-ro) = Geschenk"
/>

Tipp: Lege die Zungenspitze zwischen die ZÃ¤hne und summe dabei.

### Das stimmlose "th" (Î¸)

<VocabCard
  word="Î˜ - Theta"
  translation="Stimmloses 'th' wie im Englischen 'think'"
  pronunciation="th (stimmlos)"
  example="Î¸Î­Î»Ï‰ (THE-lo) = ich will, Î¸Î¬Î»Î±ÏƒÏƒÎ± (THA-la-sa) = Meer"
/>

Tipp: Wie bei Delta, aber ohne zu summen - nur Luft ausstoÃŸen.

### Das griechische "g" (Î³)

<VocabCard
  word="Î“ - Gamma"
  translation="Vor a, o, u: wie 'g' mit Reibung. Vor e, i: wie deutsches 'j'"
  pronunciation="g/j"
  example="Î³Î¬Ï„Î± (GA-ta) = Katze, Î³ÎµÎ¹Î± (JA) = Hallo"
/>

<CultureTip title="Das 'Î³' ist knifflig!" flag="ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡·">
Das griechische Gamma (Î³) ist einer der schwierigsten Laute. Vor "a, o, u" ist es ein reibendes "g" (Ã¤hnlich wie beim Gurgeln), vor "e, i" wird es zu einem weichen "j" wie in "ja". Ãœbung macht den Meister!
</CultureTip>

## Betonung im Griechischen

Im Griechischen zeigt ein Akzent (Î„) die betonte Silbe an:

| Wort | Betonung | Bedeutung |
|------|----------|-----------|
| **Î±Î³Î¬Ï€Î·** | a-GA-pi | Liebe |
| **ÎµÎ»Î»Î·Î½Î¹ÎºÎ¬** | e-li-ni-KA | Griechisch |
| **ÎµÏ…Ï‡Î±ÏÎ¹ÏƒÏ„Ï** | ef-cha-ris-TO | Danke |
| **ÎºÎ±Î»Î·Î¼Î­ÏÎ±** | ka-li-ME-ra | Guten Morgen |

<VocabCard
  word="Die Betonungsregel"
  translation="Der Akzent zeigt immer die betonte Silbe"
  example="Im modernen Griechisch kann die Betonung nur auf einer der letzten drei Silben liegen."
/>

## Ãœbung: Romantische WÃ¶rter

<VocabCard
  word="Î£'Î±Î³Î±Ï€Ï"
  translation="Ich liebe dich"
  pronunciation="sa-ga-PO"
  example="Das 'Ïƒ' am Anfang verschmilzt mit dem folgenden Vokal."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Î‘Î³Î¬Ï€Î· Î¼Î¿Ï…"
  translation="Meine Liebe"
  pronunciation="a-GA-pi mu"
  example="Beachte das 'Î³' vor 'Î±' - ein weiches, reibendes 'g'."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Î¦Î¹Î»Î¯"
  translation="Kuss"
  pronunciation="fi-LI"
  example="Das 'Ï†' wird wie deutsches 'f' ausgesprochen."
/>

## HÃ¤ufige Aussprachefehler

| Fehler | Richtig | Tipp |
|--------|---------|------|
| Î² wie "b" | Î² = "v" | Î²Î¹Î²Î»Î¯Î¿ = vi-VLI-o (Buch) |
| Î´ wie "d" | Î´ = "th" (stimmhaft) | Î´Î­ÎºÎ± = THE-ka (zehn) |
| Î¸ wie "t" | Î¸ = "th" (stimmlos) | Î¸Î­Î»Ï‰ = THE-lo (ich will) |
| Î³ immer gleich | Î³ vor e/i = "j" | Î³ÎµÎ¹Î± = JA (Hallo) |
| Î· wie "e" | Î· = "i" | ÎºÎ±Î»Î® = ka-LI (gut, fem.) |

## ÃœbungssÃ¤tze

| Griechisch | Langsame Aussprache | Deutsch |
|------------|---------------------|---------|
| **Î“ÎµÎ¹Î± ÏƒÎ¿Ï…** | JA su | Hallo |
| **Î£'Î±Î³Î±Ï€Ï** | sa-ga-PO | Ich liebe dich |
| **Î•Ï…Ï‡Î±ÏÎ¹ÏƒÏ„Ï** | ef-cha-ris-TO | Danke |
| **Î•Î¯ÏƒÎ±Î¹ ÏŒÎ¼Î¿ÏÏ†Î·** | I-se O-mor-fi | Du bist schÃ¶n (zu einer Frau) |
| **ÎšÎ±Î»Î·Î½ÏÏ‡Ï„Î±** | ka-li-NICH-ta | Gute Nacht |

## Schnellreferenz

**Vokale:**
- Î‘/Î± = a | Î•/Îµ = e | Î—/Î· = i | Î™/Î¹ = i | ÎŸ/Î¿ = o | Î¥/Ï… = i | Î©/Ï‰ = o

**Schwierige Konsonanten:**
- Î’/Î² = v | Î“/Î³ = g/j | Î”/Î´ = th (stimmhaft) | Î˜/Î¸ = th (stimmlos) | Î§/Ï‡ = ch

**Doppelbuchstaben:**
- Î±Î¹ = e | ÎµÎ¹ = i | Î¿Î¹ = i | Î¿Ï… = u | Î±Ï… = av/af | ÎµÏ… = ev/ef

**Doppelkonsonanten:**
- Î¼Ï€ = b/mb | Î½Ï„ = d/nd | Î³Îº = g/ng

Mit etwas Ãœbung wirst du die griechische Aussprache schnell meistern!

<CTA />

articles.title: 45 SalutÄƒri È™i RÄƒmas Bun Ã®n FrancezÄƒ pentru a Topi Inima Partenerului
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';
import ConjugationTable from '@components/ConjugationTable.astro';
import CultureTip from '@components/CultureTip.astro';
import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';

Imagine starting each day with a romantic French greeting that makes your partner smile, or ending your video calls with heartfelt French farewells that keep the spark alive. These essential greetings and farewells will transform your daily interactions into moments of connection and romance.

<PhraseOfDay
  word="Bonjour mon amour"
  translation="Good morning my love"
  pronunciation="bon-ZHOOR mon ah-MOOR"
  context="The perfect way to greet your partner each morning - romantic and sweet."
/>

## Essential Daily Greetings (1-10)

These ten greetings form the foundation of every French conversation. Master these together and you'll sound naturally romantic from day one!

<VocabCard
  word="Bonjour"
  translation="Hello/Good day"
  pronunciation="bon-ZHOOR"
  example="Bonjour, comment vas-tu aujourd'hui?"
/>

| French | English | Pronunciation | When to Use |
|--------|---------|---------------|-------------|
| **Salut** | Hi/Bye | sah-LOO | Informal greeting with friends and partner |
| **Bonsoir** | Good evening | bon-SWAHR | Evening greetings (after 6 PM) |
| **Bonne journÃ©e** | Have a good day | bon zhoor-NAY | When saying goodbye during the day |
| **Bonne soirÃ©e** | Have a good evening | bon swah-RAY | Evening farewell |
| **Bon aprÃ¨s-midi** | Good afternoon | bon ah-pray MEE-dee | Afternoon greeting (12-6 PM) |
| **Rebonjour** | Hello again | ruh-bon-ZHOOR | When meeting someone again same day |
| **Coucou** | Hey there | koo-KOO | Very informal, playful greeting |
| **AllÃ´** | Hello (phone) | ah-LOH | Only when answering phone calls |
| **Bienvenue** | Welcome | byan-veh-NOO | Welcoming someone to your home |

<CultureTip flag="ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡·" title="La Bise - The French Kiss">
In France, people often greet with **la bise** (cheek kisses) - typically 2-4 kisses depending on the region. With your partner, it's always appropriate and romantic!
</CultureTip>

## Romantic Morning Greetings (11-20)

Start your partner's day with these heart-melting morning expressions:

<VocabCard
  word="Bonjour mon trÃ©sor"
  translation="Good morning my treasure"
  pronunciation="bon-ZHOOR mon tray-ZOR"
  example="Bonjour mon trÃ©sor, tu as bien dormi?"
/>

| French | English | Pronunciation |
|--------|---------|---------------|
| **Bonjour mon chÃ©ri** | Good morning my dear (to man) | bon-ZHOOR mon shay-REE |
| **Bonjour ma chÃ©rie** | Good morning my dear (to woman) | bon-ZHOOR mah shay-REE |
| **Bonjour mon cÅ“ur** | Good morning my heart | bon-ZHOOR mon kur |
| **Bonjour ma belle** | Good morning beautiful | bon-ZHOOR mah bell |
| **Bonjour mon beau** | Good morning handsome | bon-ZHOOR mon boh |
| **Bonjour mon ange** | Good morning my angel | bon-ZHOOR mon ahnzh |
| **Bonjour ma princesse** | Good morning princess | bon-ZHOOR mah prahn-SES |
| **Bonjour mon prince** | Good morning prince | bon-ZHOOR mon prahnss |
| **Bonjour mon chaton** | Good morning my kitten | bon-ZHOOR mon shah-TOHN |

## Sweet Farewells for Every Occasion (21-30)

These farewells will keep the romance alive even when you're apart. Want more romantic expressions? Check out our guide to [expresii romantice franÈ›uzeÈ™ti pentru fiecare ocazie](/learn/ro/fr/romantic-french-phrases-for-every-occasion/).

| French | English | Pronunciation |
|--------|---------|---------------|
| **Au revoir mon amour** | Goodbye my love | oh ruh-VWAHR mon ah-MOOR |
| **Ã€ bientÃ´t** | See you soon | ah byan-TOH |
| **Ã€ tout Ã  l'heure** | See you later | ah too tah LUR |
| **Ã€ demain** | See you tomorrow | ah duh-MAN |
| **Bonne nuit mon cÅ“ur** | Good night my heart | bon NEE mon kur |
| **Fais de beaux rÃªves** | Sweet dreams | fay duh boh REV |
| **Je t'aime** | I love you | zhuh tem |
| **Je pense Ã  toi** | I'm thinking of you | zhuh pahnss ah twah |
| **Prends soin de toi** | Take care of yourself | prahn swan duh twah |
| **Ã€ plus tard** | See you later | ah ploos tahr |

<CultureTip flag="ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡·" title="Text Message Goodbyes">
Young French couples often use **"A+"** (pronounced "ah plus") for "Ã  plus tard" in text messages - casual and trendy!
</CultureTip>

## Special Occasion Greetings (31-40)

Perfect for celebrating milestones and special moments together:

<VocabCard
  word="Joyeux anniversaire mon amour"
  translation="Happy birthday my love"
  pronunciation="zhwah-YUH ah-nee-vair-SAIR mon ah-MOOR"
  example="Joyeux anniversaire mon amour, que cette journÃ©e soit magique!"
/>

| French | English | Pronunciation |
|--------|---------|---------------|
| **Bonne fÃªte mon cÅ“ur** | Happy celebration my heart | bon fet mon kur |
| **Joyeuses fÃªtes** | Happy holidays | zhwa-yuhz fet |
| **Bonne annÃ©e** | Happy New Year | bon ah-NAY |
| **Meilleurs vÅ“ux** | Best wishes | may-yur vuh |
| **FÃ©licitations mon amour** | Congratulations my love | fay-lee-see-tah-see-yon |
| **Bonnes vacances** | Have a good vacation | bon vah-kahnss |
| **Bon week-end** | Have a good weekend | bon weekend |
| **Bon appÃ©tit mon chÃ©ri** | Enjoy your meal my dear | bon ah-pay-TEE |
| **SantÃ© mon amour** | Cheers my love | sahn-TAY |

## How to Practice These Together

Make these greetings part of your daily routine! Start with simple **"Bonjour"** and **"Bonsoir"** each day, then gradually add the romantic variations. Practice pronouncing them together - French pronunciation can be tricky for Romanian speakers, especially the nasal sounds.

**Common mistakes to avoid:**
- Don't pronounce the final consonants in French (unlike Romanian)
- The French "r" is throaty, not rolled like in Romanian
- "Bonjour" is never used after 6 PM - switch to "Bonsoir"

For more romantic expressions to use with your partner, explore our collection of [porecle franÈ›uzeÈ™ti pentru partenerul tÄƒu](/learn/ro/fr/french-pet-names-for-your-partner/).

<CultureTip flag="ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡·" title="The Art of Greeting">
French people always greet when entering shops, restaurants, or meeting friends. With your partner, make it extra special with terms of endearment every time!
</CultureTip>

Learning these greetings and farewells together creates beautiful moments of connection throughout your day. Whether you're starting the morning with **"Bonjour mon amour"** or ending the night with **"Bonne nuit mon cÅ“ur"**, each phrase strengthens your bond while building your French skills.

Ready to transform your daily conversations into romantic French moments? These 45 essential greetings and farewells are your gateway to sounding naturally loving and fluent with your partner.

<CTA />
